name: STIGMA
description: Stigma App is a media firm and mental health app dedicated to eradicating the stigma associated with mental illness and other misunderstood disorders. Founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, IL.
one_liner: Stigma App is a media firm and mental health app dedicated to eradicating the stigma associated with mental illness and other misunderstood disorders. Founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, IL.
